title: Digital Minimalism: A Guide for Modern Students

content.title: Reclaiming Your Attention
contents: Digital minimalism isn't about throwing away your phone; it's about making sure your tools serve you, rather than the other way around. By stripping away non-essential apps and notifications, you reclaim your most valuable resource: your attention.
A minimalist digital footprint leads to a more focused and peaceful mental state.

content.title: Strategies for a Digital Reset
contents: Try a digital declutter: remove everything you haven't used in a month, and curate your feeds to only include sources that inspire or inform you.
Be the master of your digital life.
